Question: C SEED CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
C SEED

Product: C SEED N1 TV

- 137-inch unfolding indoor TV
- Fully automated opening in 60 seconds to a height of 7.8 feet
- 4K microLED display with 180° rotation
- Adaptive Gap Calibration for seamless picture quality
- Aerospace aluminum construction
- 1,000 nits brightness, 64 billion colors, 3,840 Hz refresh rate
- Integrated audio with 100-watt broadband speakers
- Available in 137-inch, 103-inch, and 165-inch sizes
- C SEED Silver and C SEED Champagne color options
- Priced at around US$200,000
- Available at booth 19748 in Central Hall at CES 2024
Summary_cn:
C SEED

产品：C SEED N1 电视

- 137英寸的可折叠室内电视
- 完全自动化，在60秒内展开至7.8英尺高度
- 4K微型LED显示屏，可旋转180°
- 自适应间隙校准，确保无缝画质
- 航天铝构造
- 1,000尼特亮度，64亿种颜色，3,840赫兹刷新率
- 集成音频，配有100瓦宽带扬声器
- 有137英寸、103英寸和165英寸尺寸可供选择
- C SEED 银色和C SEED 香槟色可选
- 价格约为20万美元
- CES 2024中央展厅19748展台有售
